actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To establish a loan repayment program for qualifying physicians and nurse practitioners participating in the Medicare Program.
short_title: Partnership to Improve Seniors Access to Medicare Act

summary.text: Partnership to Improve Seniors Access to Medicare Act - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to establish a student loan repayment program for qualified physicians and nurse practitioners participating in Medicare who agree to accept Medicare individuals who seek the services of such health professionals.

titles.title: Partnership to Improve Seniors Access to Medicare Act
To establish a loan repayment program for qualifying physicians and nurse practitioners participating in the Medicare Program.
